name: Ready Mobile Components for Adobe XD
description: The plugin helps you to generate the basic general purpose components which are commonly used. You can further carve these components to your choice by just changing the styles.
author: Rohit Methwani
releaseNotes:
New version released!
We’re constantly working to better your experience with the plugin. Here’s a summary to what has changed.
Improvements
- General UX improvements. 
- Dynamic Components for all sizes of mobile art boards. 
Some bugs fixed.
